verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3050>Lord<s%>. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H3372>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that <S%H2654>delights<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> in his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
His <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H1368>mighty<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>: the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>.
<S%H1952>Wealth<s%> and <S%H6239>riches<s%> shall be in his <S%H1004>house<s%>: and his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5975>endures<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
Unto the <S%H3477>upright<s%> there <S%H2224>arises<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> in the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>: he is <S%H2587>gracious<s%>, and full of <S%H7349>compassion<s%>, and <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
A <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shows <S%H2603>favor<s%>, and <S%H3867>lends<s%>: he will <S%H3557>guide<s%> his <S%H1697>affairs<s%> with <S%H4941>discretion<s%>.
Surely he shall not be <S%H4131>moved<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be in <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2143>memory<s%>.
He shall not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8052>news<s%>: his <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed<s%>, <S%H982>trusting<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H5564>established<s%>, he shall not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, until he <S%H7200>see<s%> his desire upon his <S%H6862>enemies<s%>.

He has <S%H6340>dispersed<s%>, he has <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H34>poor<s%>; his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5975>endures<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>; his <S%H7161>horn<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> with <S%H3519>honor<s%>.

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3707>it<s%>, and be grieved; he shall <S%H2786>gnash<s%> with his <S%H8127>teeth<s%>, and melt <S%H4549>away<s%>: the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>.
